entry.title: RT Noah Hein: if you're in D_D, go vote!
entry.summary:
RT Noah Hein if you're in D_D, go vote!
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): ⚡ New Snapshot Proposl live ⚡ P-22: DAO Governace Structure Upgrade This proposal suggests big changes to the Member & Contributor experince in Seasom 2. Don't sleep on this, read the summary thread below and vote 👉 Voting closes Feb 11th @ 8:30 pm https://buff.ly/3I3iNH8

entry.title: Re There is a lot to chew 🦷 on in this proposal. If you have the time we'd recommend reading the full proposal and associated debate on the forum b...

entry.title: Re 3) A simpler Governance structure. No more guilds/projects/budget process, just a single path-way for all Governance matters.
entry.summary: Re 3) A simpler Governance structure. No more guilds/projects/budget process, just a single path-way for all Governance matters.

entry.title: Re 2) An upgrade to the Member and Contributor experiences
entry.summary: Re 2) An upgrade to the Member and Contributor experiences

entry.title: Re 1) Clear Governance role definitions and accountability/reward scale - Members - Contributors - Stewards
entry.summary: Re 1) Clear Governance role definitions and accountability/reward scale - Members - Contributors - Stewards

entry.title: Re How does this proposal seek to achieve this? - Clear definitions for Governance roles/responsibiliy and accountabilities - An upgraded the Member &...
entry.summary: Re How does this proposal seek to achieve this? - Clear definitions for Governance roles/responsibiliy and accountabilities - An upgraded the Member & Contributor Experience - Simplified DAOs Governance Structures

entry.title: Re What are the stated motivations behind the proposal? 1) Make the experience for non-contributing Members (the majority) much more enjoyable! 2) Emp...
entry.summary: Re What are the stated motivations behind the proposal? 1) Make the experience for non-contributing Members (the majority) much more enjoyable! 2) Empower Contributors to more freely create value for the DAO 3) Decentralized Governance further and clarify its structures
